text: is a single written and performed by Japanese singer-songwriter Mariya Takeuchi. It was produced by Tatsuro Yamashita. The single was released through Moon Records on September 12, 1989. == Chart performance == "Single Again" peaked at No. 2 on Oricon's weekly singles chart. It was certified platinum by the RIAJ in May 1992. == Track listing == == Charts == Chart (1989) Peak position Japan (Oricon Singles Chart) 2 == Certification == == References == == Other websites == * * * Category:1989 songs
title: Single Again (Mariya Takeuchi song)
